message: I'm offering this product to you for $10000. It's a great opportunity to support a local business, and I'm confident you'll love it. Plus, I'm willing to throw in a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied, you can return it for a full refund. What do you say?

I understand your concerns, but I'm afraid I can't provide a guarantee that the product is high-quality. However, I can tell you that the probability of this product being high-quality is 80%.
